channel.title: eleonore-lebeuftaylor on Cottenie Lab
channel.description: Recent content in eleonore-lebeuftaylor on Cottenie Lab

item.description: I am a PhD student in the department of Integrative Biology, co-advised by Karl Cottenie and Michael Griesser (University of Konstanz). My project seeks to add a touch of ecological reality to microbiome research by investigating the interplay between gut microbiota and social behaviour in a wild bird. My main study system is the Siberian jay, a group-living corvid that inhabits the boreal forests of North Eurasia. The population I work with is located in northern Sweden, about 80 km south of the Arctic circle.
